name: recordSummaryTile
title: Record Summary Tile
subTitle: The Record Summary Tile widget takes JSON data from a FortiSOAR module record and presents it in a user-friendly format within a tile, simplifying data comprehension and visualization.

metadata.description: The Record Summary widget extracts JSON data from your FortiSOARâ„¢ module records and presents it in a tile format. Complex information is distilled into a glanceable summary, making it easy to understand and act upon.
